title: Fifth Clan (Part 1)
body:
Fifth Clan (Part 1)

Thud!

With a thudding sound, Malark appeared in Evan's room out of nowhere and fell face first to the ground.

"Huh?" As he was an S rank hunter, this small fall didn't cause any damage to him and he opened his eyes.

After opening his eyes when Malark noticed he was in an unfamiliar place, he was stunned and quickly got up from the ground.

"What is goin_" Malark suddenly stopped speaking midway when he noticed Evan sitting in front of him with a frown on his face. He was rubbing his temples and muttering something in a low voice.

'It seems using the law of space is far more taxing than using the normal laws' Evan said inwardly when he felt he reached his limit just after teleporting Malark here.

After a minute of rest, the strain Evan was feeling on his body subsided a bit and he finally looked at Malark who was standing at a distance from him with a confused face.
